MemberSignature.Value: public bool SupportsUids { get; }
.property instance bool SupportsUids

Docs.summary: Gets whether or not the service supports referencing messages by UIDs.
Docs.value: true if supports uids; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: Not all servers support referencing messages by UID, so this property should be checked before using and .
If the server does not support UIDs, then all methods that take UID arguments along with and will fail.
